Children's Hospital doctor charged with child porn

Dr. Richard Keller was charged after more than 500 pictures and between 60 and 100 DVDs were found in his Andover home, federal officials said. (Boston Globe)

Henry: Red Sox not for sale

Red Sox owner John Henry today refuted a Fox Business story that claimed his ownership group intended to sell the Red Sox. (Boston Globe)

The Red Sox wives hosted the 11th annual From Fenway to the Runway fundraiser in Boston on Thursday.

Fallout continues at state crime lab

One person has resigned, another was fired, and a third may receive disciplinary action in the wake of alleged mishandling of drug evidence. (Boston Globe)

4th case of EEE detected in Mass.

A man in his 60s from southeastern Mass. is the fourth state resident to be infected with Eastern equine encephalitis and is now hospitalized. (Boston Globe)
